text: Melvin Andrew Aull (December 23, 1928 â€“ October 12, 2019) was a Canadian football player. He played for the Hamilton Tiger-Cats, Ottawa Rough Riders and Saskatchewan Roughriders. He won the Grey Cup with the Rough Riders in 1951.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=aullmel001 He was born in Hamilton, Ontario. Aull died on October 12, 2019 in Mississauga, Ontario at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:Ottawa Rough Riders players Category:Saskatchewan Roughriders players Category:Sportspeople from Hamilton, Ontario
title: Mel Aull
